Compliance test bit streams and decoded PCM files generated by

Bodo Teichmann                                         tmn@iis.fhg.de
Fraunhofer Institut Integrierte Schaltungen (FhG-IIS)  phone: +49-9131 776367
Am Weichselgarten 3, D-91058 Erlangen, Germany         fax:   +49-9131 776399
------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Files:	test23.mpg	(encoded base bitstream, mpeg1 compatible)
	test23.ext	(encoded extension bitstream)

	test23_c.pcm	(decoded pcm file, center channel)
	test23_l.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left channel)
	test23_ls.pcm	(decoded pcm file, left surround channel)
	test23_r.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right channel)
	test23_rs.pcm	(decoded pcm file, right surround channel)
	test23_lfe.pcm	(low frequency enhancement channel)

	test23.pcm	(decoded pcm file, mpeg1 compatible stereo 
			 left/right channels, interleaved samples,
			 i.e. LRLRLR...)


Test signal:	Harpsichord


Description:
	Layer					III
        matrix                                  0
        extension                               yes
        phantom center                          yes
        prediction                              no
        sampling freq.                          48K
        LFE                                     yes
        multilingal                             no
        ancillary data                          no
        bitrate base stream                     320kbps
        bitrate extension stream                320kbps
        configuration                           3/2
	dematrixing				yes
	segment lists				yes
	matrix attenuation			no
	scale factor select info		no
